https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rfClLIyeHqpMofmrPY8DaLe4z9x.jpg A miserable conman and his partner pose as Santa and his Little Helper to rob department stores on Christmas Eve. But they run into problems when the conman befriends a troubled kid. Bad Santa
